desc: Whether you’re an Elements newbie or an experienced veteran, this book will teach you all you need to know–from adjustments to bring out the best in your photos, editing in five easy steps, and repairing color and lighting, to working with raw files–and much more! The chapter structure has been completely revamped, with more emphasis on the features that users request to get up and running quickly. This includes a new introductory chapter on editing in five easy steps and more comprehensive coverage on handling Camera Raw images from DSLR shooters. This fully updated edition includes: concise, step-by-step instructions; hundreds of carefully edited full color photographs; screen captures of program features; supplemental tips and sidebars; and a thorough table of contents and index. This guide for both Windows and Mac OS X follows the integration of the Elements 10 software with parallel features for both platforms.
title: Photoshop Elements 10 for Windows and Mac OS X: Visual QuickStart Guide
